All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Card
describes the card as composed of a number (int) a color (char) and a type (Type)
CardB
visual representation of the model card
ClassicPanel
graphical representation of the state of the game in classic mode.
DeadlyPanel
graphical representation of the state of the game in deadly mode.
Game
 
GameClassic
This class logically represents the classic game mode.
GameDeadly
This class logically represents the deadly game mode.
GameHouseRules
This class logically represents the house rules game mode.
HouseRulesPanel
graphical representation of the state of the game in houseRules mode.

MenuPanel
this panel contains the Menu's JButton (Play, Profile, Exit) and the Mute sound JButton
ModesPanel
this class contains all the JButtons of the modes available to play (Classic, House Rules, Deadly)
Panel
This class contains the default components shared by all game panels (classicPanel, houseRulesPanel, deadlyPanel) and implementing Observer receives all updates from the model
PlayerAI
This class represents the generic artificial player (PlayerAI)

This class represents the artificial player (PlayerAI)

This class represents the artificial player (PlayerAI)

This class represents the player

This class represents the player
ProfilePanel
This class represents visually the Stats class, it includes the nickname, matches won, matches lost and matches played by the player
RulesPanel
This class contains the rules of the modes described inside a JScrollPane
Sound
it stores and manages all the sounds (songs and sounds effects) of the game
Stats
This class contains all of the player's stats
Type
cards types's enumeration
UtilityMethods
class with utility methods for working on images
